item.description:
Everyone has been playing well so let's meet again this Saturday in West Hartford. I am not 100 % sure I will be there but hope to be. The Single Event tennis group organized by Eric is planning to start at 9:30 so there should be plenty of people to connect with. Newcomers are encouraged to attend.

Have a safe holiday and I hope to see everyone at Conard.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Tennis at Conard
